pr_title: feat: US-Core: Upgrade to STU3 Release 3.1.1 #1311 #1427

timeline.message:
feat: US-Core: Upgrade to STU3 Release 3.1.1 #1311 #1427

- Added XML and JSON examples for fhir-ig-us-core and add entries in
Index.java
- Added the specification artifacts and cleaned up the
CapabilityStatements so CapabilityStatement.text contains valid XHTML
- Updated the CHANGELOG with spec element changes
- Update Tests for profile changes
- Add fhir-examples to pom.xml for fhir-ig-us-core
- Created Factory to run through the Spec Tests
	- Modified DiagnosticReport-cardiology-report.json and
DiagnosticReport-cardiology-report.xml to corrected hash value
	- Modified MedicationRequest-uscore-mo2.xml and
MedicationRequest-uscore-mo2.json (invalid xhtml)
MedicationRequest-uscore-mo2.json as it contains invalid XHTML in the
narrative text
- Added IT tests for:
	- USCoreAllergyIntoleranceTest - SHOULD/SHALL and REVINCLUDE
	- USCoreCarePlanTest - SHOULD/SHALL with one caveat the implication of
system|code is not supported.  We support system less only.

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

doc: updated the doc to indicate support for STU3.1.1

- Disables the Unit Tests on Windows Build and Update windows.yml to
catch early Windows Build Errors

timeline.bodyText: did we need to generate our own .index.json file for US Core?  does it include an .index.json that just isn't valid or does it not even have one?
timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: This is a net new file. The version in master does not have an IndexGenerator utility class. @prb112 does the latest. version not include a .index.json file?
replies.author: JohnTimm

replies.bodyText: so - I totally own this one... I copied from a directory (. is hidden) so I had to generate the index.  I'll copy over the official one and remove the Generator.  This is on me.
replies.author: prb112

timeline.bodyText:
pretty minor, but this will be taken as javadoc for only PROFILES_US_CORE_JSON.  i'd suggest we either change it to a block comment (removing a single *) or just have one for each.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                /**
          
          
            
                 * US Core Examples in XML and JSON
          
          
            
                 */
          
          
            
                PROFILES_US_CORE_JSON("/profiles-us-core-json.txt"),
          
          
            
                /*
          
          
            
                 * US Core Examples in XML and JSON
          
          
            
                 */
          
          
            
                PROFILES_US_CORE_JSON("/profiles-us-core-json.txt"),
timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: Fixed locally and bundled into one PR
replies.author: prb112

timeline.message:
fix: per code review of the US Core STU 3.1.1

- Fix the Workflow
- Copied over the hidden .index.json to the us-core package
- Removed the IndexGenerator (wasn't needed)
- Cleaned up change log to include only what is relevant and necessary
- Fixed up the index to not include javadoc

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>
